attributes.action: Vote of no confidence for the Countries choice for Prime Minister.General/Snap.
attributes.additional_details:
The people of this Country can make a difference and change politics (English/British) forever. Nobody has got a fair choice of who we want to be PM .A snap election is against a vote 17.4 million voters decisions. He conned us into another  election,a snap election of pro remain candidates. There for a "Snap GENERAL Election should be invoked along with article 50 of the Lisbon treatie. No other. A general election can and should be put into protest. We can't rely on remain camp.GB
It's ours.
attributes.background: The Country has a majority vote to leave the EU (it's politics) the Great British/GreatBritain NEED the next PM to be a supporter of Brexit, other wise negotiating will not be done in the proper way and that is what  we have voted for.
